Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Garfield/Damen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 59th, Ashland, over normal route on 55th, due to street blockage near Garfield/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 59th, Ashland, over normal route on 55th, due to street blockage near Garfield/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
